summary: Phase 2 Migration (Content & Backup modules) - Complete validation. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend modules AdminContent and AdminBackup fully functional with proper navigation and CRUD operations.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/content/categories - Returns 5 default categories
Backend: POST /api/v1/admin/content/categories/init-defaults - Initializes default categories
Backend: POST /api/v1/admin/content/categories - Creates new category
Backend: PUT /api/v1/admin/content/categories/{id} - Updates category
Backend: DELETE /api/v1/admin/content/categories/{id} - Deletes category
Backend: DELETE /api/v1/admin/content/categories/{id} - Returns error for non-existent
Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/content/depot - Lists content items with status_counts
Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/content/depot?status=pending - Filters by status
Backend: POST /api/v1/admin/content/depot - Creates content item with pending status
Backend: PUT /api/v1/admin/content/depot/{id}/status - Updates status (pending→optimized→accepted→published)
Backend: PUT /api/v1/admin/content/depot/{id}/status - Returns error for invalid status
Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/content/seo-analytics - Returns SEO stats (total, published, avg_score, publish_rate)
Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/backup/stats - Returns backup statistics
Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/backup/code/files - Lists code files tracked
Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/backup/code/files?search=test - Searches code files
Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/backup/database - Lists DB backups
Backend: POST /api/v1/admin/backup/database - Creates DB backup with collections list
Backend: DELETE /api/v1/admin/backup/database/{id} - Deletes backup
Backend: DELETE /api/v1/admin/backup/database/{id} - Returns error for non-existent
Backend: GET /api/v1/admin/backup/prompts - Lists prompt versions
Frontend: /admin-premium sidebar has 'Contenu' and 'Backups' navigation items
Frontend: AdminContent module loads with Categories, Content Depot, SEO Analytics tabs
Frontend: Categories tab shows 5 default categories with edit/delete buttons
Frontend: New Category form displays with ID, Name, Icon, Order fields
Frontend: Content Depot tab shows status filters (pending, optimized, accepted, published)
Frontend: New Content form displays with Title, Type, Platform, Content fields
Frontend: SEO Analytics tab shows 6 KPI cards (Total, Published, Pending, Score, Categories, Rate)
Frontend: AdminBackup module loads with Overview, Code, Prompts, Database tabs
Frontend: Overview tab shows 4 stat cards (Code files, Prompts, DB backups, Total size)
Frontend: Database tab shows backup list with 'Nouveau Backup' button
Frontend: Code tab shows file search and file list
critical_code_review_comments: ContentAdminService properly implements CRUD for categories and content depot
BackupAdminService properly implements stats, code files, and database backup management
Router correctly registers all Phase 2 endpoints under /api/v1/admin/content/* and /api/v1/admin/backup/*
Frontend AdminContent.jsx has proper data-testid attributes for testing
Frontend AdminBackup.jsx has proper data-testid attributes for testing
AdminPremiumPage.jsx correctly imports and renders AdminContent and AdminBackup modules
Sidebar navigation includes 'content' and 'backup' items with proper icons
seed_data_creation: Default categories initialized via /api/v1/admin/content/categories/init-defaults (5 categories: chasse, vetements, optique, accessoires, formation)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 Migration complete. Content Admin module (categories, content depot, SEO analytics) and Backup Admin module (stats, code files, prompts, database backups) fully tested. All 20 backend API tests pass. Frontend modules AdminContent and AdminBackup are accessible via /admin-premium sidebar. Default categories have been initialized. Test backup 'Test Phase 2' exists with 18 collections.
